text: Colors is a 1988 American police procedural crime drama movie. It was directed by Dennis Hopper and stars Robert Duvall and Sean Penn. They play Los Angeles Police Department officers Bob Hodges and Danny McGavin who tackle gang crime. == Other websites == * Category:1980s buddy movies Category:1988 crime drama movies Category:Antisocial personality disorder in fiction Category:American buddy movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:American gangster movies Category:Buddy cop movies Category:Buddy drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Spanish-language movies Category:American independent movies
title: Colors (movie)
